lines.text: [Frank reassuringly points to a corner of the room]
No it isn't. It's right there...
[Looking out his hotel window at the ancient marketplace]
We're in the middle of a damn swap meet!
I'm Prosatanos, your passage to eternity!
That which he covets will prove to be his demise!

[to Frank]
And I thought you were a shitty driver.
Oh, shitty? Oh, it's a - It's a Latin expression for a - A "hotshot".
Hotshot, you know. Uh, a top gun.
Top Gun. Top Gun. Yeah, I seen this movie. It's very good. I like it. I'm a very shitty driver, yeah?
You know, we're all cops here.

I'm the only cop. You two are tourists. And that will be your only status while you are in Israel. Attempt to practice your trade here, and I promise you I will bury you in the deepest, darkest, filthiest hole I can find.
